page.title: 09Roads and Transport
page.content: Ecton is just off the A4500 the old main road from Wellingborough to Northampton. To the south of the village is the new A45, a dual carriageway that joins to the M1. A group of children went up to the footbridge near Ecton Brook on Friday 17th May 1985 at 9.30a.m. They had a checklist each and ticked off the number and types of vehicles they saw in a 15 minute period. They saw: 95 cars, 27 vans, 19 lorries, 2 buses, 5 coaches, 1 motor bike, 1 bicycle, 1 tractor, 2 pick-up trucks, 4 taxis, 1 landrover, 1 police car and 1 ambulance.
